mapper.insert: insert into advertising (advertising_id , advertising_category , advertising_name , advertising_tel , advertising_email , advertising_pwd , advertising_manager , advertising_serial) values (#{id}, #{category}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{manager}, #{serial})
mapper.select: select advertising_id as id, advertising_category as category, advertising_name as name, advertising_tel as tel, advertising_manager as manager, advertising_email as email, create_date as createDate, advertising_pwd as pwd, advertising_serial as serial from advertising where advertising_id = #{value}

select advertising_no as no, advertising_title as title, advertising_id as id, advertising_no_pwd as noPwd, advertising_status as status, advertising_image as image, to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, advertising_term as term, advertising_type as "type", create_date as createDate from advertising_board where advertising_id = #{value} order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into advertising_board (advertising_no , advertising_title , advertising_id , advertising_no_pwd , advertising_image , start_date , end_date , advertising_term , advertising_type) values (advertising_board_seq.nextval , #{title}, #{id}, #{noPwd}, #{image} , to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') , #{term}, #{type})
mapper.select: select advertising_no as no, advertising_title as title, advertising_id as id, advertising_no_pwd as noPwd, advertising_status as status, advertising_image as image, to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, advertising_term as term, advertising_type as type, create_date as createDate from advertising_board where advertising_no =#{value} order by advertising_no desc

select advertising_id as id, advertising_category as category, advertising_name as name, advertising_tel as tel, advertising_manager as manager, advertising_email as email, create_date as createDate, advertising_pwd as pwd, advertising_serial as serial from advertising order by createDate desc

select advertising_id as id, advertising_category as category, advertising_name as name, advertising_tel as tel, advertising_manager as manager, advertising_email as email, create_date as createDate, advertising_pwd as pwd, advertising_serial as serial from advertising where ( advertising_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_category like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_serial like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_manager like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) order by create_date desc

select advertising_no as no, advertising_title as title, advertising_id as id, advertising_no_pwd as noPwd, advertising_status as status, advertising_image as image, to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, advertising_term as "term", advertising_type as "type", create_date as createDate from advertising_board order by advertising_no desc

select advertising_no as no, advertising_title as title, advertising_id as id, advertising_no_pwd as noPwd, advertising_status as status, advertising_image as image, to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, advertising_term as "term", advertising_type as "type", create_date as createDate from advertising_board where ( advertising_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or advertising_status like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) order by advertising_no desc
